title: Inside an unexpected fight at Apple
description:
For the past several months, a fight has been brewing inside Apple, the world’s most profitable company, about a fundamental aspect of its business: whether or not its corporate employees must return to the office. That this battle is happening at Apple signals a major shift for the company. Recode’s Shirin Ghaffary explains.

References: Read Shirin and Rani’s reporting here.
